entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
